DOC.brief_summary: Background : Radical hysterectomy important therapy early cervical cancer . Disfunction urinary dynamic common postoperative adverse effect , negative impact patient ' quality life . Nerve spar radical hysterectomy ( NSRH ) could reserve inferior hypogastric plexus ( IHP ) innervate bladder , hence improve postoperative urinary dynamic . Furthermore impact different energy instrument urinary dynamic n't clear . Objectives : This study compare urinary dynamic NSRH , analyze difference BiClamp forcep ( BiClamp® forcep , ERBE Elektromedizin , GmbH , Tuebingen , Germany ) water jet ( ERBEJET®2 ) effect dissect IHP . Study population : Cervical cancer FIGO IB stage , among 120 case enrol randomly allocate BiClamp group water jet group . Intervention : Patients accept NSRH accomplish Professor Ming Wu . Methods : All surgical patient access via urinary dynamic four month NSRH . On 14th day surgery , urinary catheter remove residual urine volume ( RUV ) measure . For patient RUV > 100 ml , urinary catheter replace . Primary study endpoint : successful rate remove urinary catheter 14th day NSRH . Secondary study endpoint : urinary dynamic four month NSRH .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Nerve-sparing Radical Hysterectomy Patients ' Urinary Dynamics
DOC.criteria: FIGO stage IB ASA score 02 Radiotherapy chemotherapy surgery ASA score > 2 With abnormal urinary dynamic surgery
